prompts.title: My Prompts
prompts.promptContent: Add the prompt instructions; you can include variables using brackets [], which lets you change variable data each time you run it.
prompts.variablesInstruction: Edit the variables to insert them into the prompt

form.title: Title
form.addTag: Press enter after typing to add a tag

generator.title: Prompt Generator
generator.instructionsPlaceholder: Describe what type of prompt you need to generate...
generator.emptyPreview: Type instructions and generate a prompt to see a preview here.

templates.Examen: I need a prompt to generate multiple-choice, essay, and practical questions for a university course.
templates.Retroalimentacion: I want a prompt to provide detailed and constructive feedback on student assignments.
templates.Rubrica: I need a prompt to create clear and objective evaluation rubrics for different types of academic work.
templates.Explicacion: I want a prompt to explain complex concepts simply to university students, using analogies and practical examples.
templates.Ejercicios: I need a prompt to design practical and challenging exercises to reinforce student learning.
templates.Investigacion: I want a prompt to guide students in designing research projects, including methodology and structure.

importExport.title: Import/Export Prompts
importExport.dropzone: Drag and drop a JSON file here, or click to select one

syllabus.title: Syllabus Settings
syllabus.info: This generates the syllabus based on the file information or the current course settings.
syllabus.warning: To regenerate, you must delete the current settings and generate again.
syllabus.allowedFormats: Allowed formats: PDF, DOCX, DOC, PPT, PPTX, CSV, XLS
syllabus.result: Syllabus generated; review it in ELSA GML via the link.

events.parameterHelp: This value will replace the parameter in the prompt
events.noParametersDetected: No parameters detected in the selected prompt.
events.errorExtractingParameters: Error extracting parameters from the prompt

home.title: Home
home.welcomeText:
AIRA (Intelligent Academic Networking Agent of CEDIA) is an AI-powered educational platform designed to support personalized learning.

With AIRA, you can access a virtual assistant that answers questions, generates educational content, and helps you organize your learning tasks. The platform adapts to different roles and needs within the educational environment.

Explore the various features based on your role and make the most of this innovative tool to enhance your educational experience.
